ability.Berserker Mode: When HP falls below 50%, Diablos's Speed and Attack are increased by 50%.
ability.Unyielding Fury: Has a 30% chance to increase Attack by 1 stage each time Diablos takes damage.

Corkscrew Burrow.effect: This move hits twice if the user is in Berserker Mode.

Multi-Charge.effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn. Each hit has a 10% chance to cause flinching.

Raging Earth.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Infernal Roar.effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.
